attributes.action: A free vote in Parliament to endorse no change in the UK's membership of the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Only 37% of the electorate voted to leave and such a major decision affecting the country should not be resultant on anything less than a majority vote of the electorate.
attributes.background: Referenda are not mandatory on Government and Parliament. The country's elected representatives are elected to govern taking into account all factors and using their judgement as to what is best for the citizens of the country.
